Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

STATION IMPROVEMENTS
[R] Manhattan-bound trains run express from 59 St, Brooklyn to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 13 - 16

Trains stop at 36 St.

For service to 53 St and 45 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N]* or
Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [R].

For service to 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr
and transfer to a local Coney Island-bound [F]* [N] or Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [F] [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [R].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
